summary: An ordinance accepting a deed from Mary Lizzie Van Nuys, a widow, of Seattle, Washington, dated January 8, 1908, conveying to the City of Seattle, the following described property; beginning at the point which is 30 feet east and 330 feet north of the stone monument set of the intersection of Evanston Avenue and North 44th Street; said distances being measured respectively parallel to the south and west marginal lines of block 9, Motor Line Addition to the City of Seattle; thence north 25 feet to the north line of lot 13 of said block 9; 36 feet; thence south 25 feet to the south line of lot 13, thence east along the south line of said lot 13, 36.5 feet to the point of beginning.
